game.title: game title
game.beginning:
The game begins with Mario and Luigi in the Mushroom Kingdom.
		Next, they encounter several obstacles such as enemies, traps, and enemies. They must use their skills to overcome these obstacles before defeating the final boss.
		Finally, the game ends with Mario and Luigi defeating Bowser and saving Princess Toadstool.
game.ending: The game ends with Mario and Luigi defeating Bowser and saving Princess Toadstool.
